page.title: Machine Upgrades
page.text: Most machines in Matter Megadrive can be upgraded. There are all sorts for upgrades. From efficiency upgrades to speed upgrades. They are all constructed from [item name=upgrade].

page.title: Speed Upgrade
page.text: The Speed Upgrade is used to speed up machines. It can be used in almost every Matter Megadrive machine.

page.title: Power Upgrade
page.text: The Power Upgrade can be used to decrease the power usage of most machines in Matter Megadrive.

page.title: Fail-Safe Upgrade
page.text: The Fail Safe Upgrade is used to lower the chance of failure. It can be used in [block name=replicator] and the [block name=decomposer], to lower the chance of failure and byproduct production in the form of [item name=matter_dust] instead of an Item or [guide name=matter_plasma].

page.title: Range Upgrade
page.text: The range upgrade is used to increase the range of machines such as the [block name=transporter] or the [block name=charging_station]

page.title: Power Storage Upgrade
page.text: The Power Storage Upgrade is used to increase the Energy Storage of Machines.

page.title: Hyper Speed Upgrade
page.text: The Hyper Speed Upgrade is the advanced version of the Speed Upgrade.

page.title: Matter Storage Upgrade
page.text: The Matter Storage Upgrade is used to increase the Matter Storage of Machinese.
